name: ci-cd
description: This is a project to test github actions

scripts.version:patch: npm version patch -m 'chore: release version %s' && npm run push:tags
scripts.version:minor: npm version minor -m 'chore: release version %s' && npm run push:tags
scripts.version:major: npm version major -m 'chore: release version %s' && npm run push:tags

author: Nathan Firmo
